name: Flowertongue
description:
Create unforgettable relationships with your friends while preparing for the Flower Festival! 

Talk to interesting characters. Find and cultivate seeds into beautiful flowers. Step into a LGBTQIA+ safe space, and relax in a gorgeous flower filled world. 

Can you learn the meaning of Flowertongue and use it to convey your feelings to your friends?

We have a page on https://www.facebook.com/Flowertongue-109739080773035

This game was made by Oopsie Daisy Games

This development team consists of students from the University of Skövde, Sweden

We hope you will enjoy our game!

// Per Bengtsson (Bengtssonsan) - Project Leader of Flowertongue
